landing.title: SafeOS Guardian

landing.taglineSub: Designed for educated, tech-savvy parents. Portable by design.

disclaimer.title: This is NOT a replacement for human supervision
disclaimer.text: SafeOS Guardian is a {bold} only. It cannot and should not replace direct human care and attention. Technology can fail. Always maintain proper supervision of children, pets, and elderly family members.

privacy.title: Privacy-First
privacy.description: All processing happens locally on your device. No cloud uploads, no data mining.

free.title: Always Free

abusePrevention.title: Abuse Prevention & Fair Use
abusePrevention.p1: We actively monitor for and prevent abuse of this humanitarian tool. Detected misuse results in {warnings}, then access restrictions.
abusePrevention.p2: In cases of widespread abuse, we reserve the right to temporarily suspend the service until better safeguards are in place. {emphasis}.
abusePrevention.emphasis: Your safety and the safety of those being monitored always come first

humanitarian.text: This is a humanitarian tool. It will {never} be charged for. Ever.

storage.title: Local Data Storage
storage.subtitle: Understanding How Your Data is Stored
storage.intro: SafeOS Guardian stores all data locally in your browser. This means your data stays on your device and is never sent to external servers.

warning.title: Important Warning
warning.text: Clearing your browser cache, cookies, or site data will permanently delete all SafeOS Guardian data. This includes your settings, monitoring history, and alert logs.

whereStored.title: Where Data is Stored
whereStored.text: Data is stored in your browser's LocalStorage and IndexedDB. This is browser-specific storage that persists between sessions.

browsers.chrome: Chrome: Settings → Privacy → Clear browsing data → Cookies and site data
browsers.firefox: Firefox: Settings → Privacy → Cookies and Site Data
browsers.safari: Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Manage Website Data
browsers.edge: Edge: Settings → Privacy → Clear browsing data

step1.title: Export Your Settings
step1.text: Go to Settings → Export Data to download a backup of your configuration.

step2.title: Avoid 'Clear All' Actions
step2.text: When clearing browser data, avoid selecting 'Cookies and site data' if you want to keep SafeOS data.

step3.title: Use Browser Profiles
step3.text: Consider creating a dedicated browser profile for SafeOS Guardian to isolate its data.

step4.title: Bookmark the Settings Export
step4.text: Regularly export your settings before any browser maintenance.

clear.title: How to Clear SafeOS Data
clear.intro: If you need to reset SafeOS Guardian completely:

option1.title: Option 1: In-App Reset
option1.text: Go to Settings → Advanced → Reset All Data. This will remove all SafeOS data but preserve your browser's other data.

option2.title: Option 2: Browser Clear
option2.text: Clear site data specifically for the SafeOS domain in your browser settings.

steps.chrome: Chrome: Click the lock icon in address bar → Site settings → Clear data
steps.firefox: Firefox: Click shield icon → Clear cookies and site data
steps.safari: Safari: Develop menu → Empty Caches for this page
steps.edge: Edge: Click lock icon → Site permissions → Reset permissions

recovery.title: Data Recovery
recovery.text: Once browser data is cleared, there is no way to recover it unless you have a previously exported backup. We strongly recommend regular exports if you have custom configurations.

about.title: About SafeOS
about.subtitle: SafeOS Guardian
about.tagline: A humanitarian tool for protecting what matters most—your loved ones, pets, and home.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: SafeOS Guardian was created with a singular purpose: to provide accessible, privacy-respecting monitoring tools for families worldwide.
mission.p2: Unlike cloud-based solutions that store your data on remote servers, SafeOS runs entirely in your browser.
mission.disclaimer: SafeOS Guardian is a supplemental, experimental tool for educated parents and caregivers. It is not a replacement for human supervision.

values.title: Our Values
values.privacyFirstDesc: All data stays on your device. We never collect, store, or sell your personal information.
values.openTransparentDesc: Our code is open source. Anyone can inspect, audit, and contribute.
values.humanitarianDesc: SafeOS is built for families, not profit. Essential features are free forever.
values.accessibleDesc: Multi-language support and offline capabilities for families everywhere.

tenPercent.title: 10% for Humanity
tenPercent.subtitle: A commitment to humanitarian causes
tenPercent.text: If SafeOS ever generates revenue, we pledge to donate 10% to humanitarian organizations focused on child safety and missing persons recovery.
